mapper.select: SELECT company_name as companyName, company_site as companySite, IFNULL(company_total_rate/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_review review WHERE review.company_cd=info.company_cd AND review.review_allow=1),0) as companyTotalRate FROM tb_company_info info ORDER BY companyTotalRate DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_info
WHERE company_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchCompanyName}, '%')

SELECT info.company_name as companyName, info.company_ceo as companyCeo, topindex.industry_topindex_name as industryTopIndexName, (SELECT company_type_name FROM tb_company_type WHERE company_type_cd = info.company_type_cd) as companyTypeName, company_birthdate as companyBirthdate, company_sales as companySales, company_site as companySite, company_phone as companyPhone, company_addr as companyAddr, company_zipcode as companyZipcode, IFNULL(info.company_total_rate/(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_company_review review WHERE review.company_cd=info.company_cd AND review.review_allow=1),0) as companyTotalRate FROM tb_company_info info, tb_industry_topindex topindex WHERE topindex.industry_topindex_cd = (SELECT industry_topindex_cd FROM tb_industry_midindex WHERE industry_midindex_cd = info.industry_midindex_cd) AND company_name = #{searchCompanyName}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_company_review( company_cd, company_name, login_id, job_topindex_cd, review_workyear, review_rate, review_comment, review_strength, review_weak, review_wish, review_promotion, review_welfare, review_culture, review_balance, review_ceorate, review_ceosupport, review_regdate, review_modidate ) VALUES ( #{companyCd}, #{companyName}, #{loginId}, #{jobTopIndexCd}, #{reviewWorkYear}, #{reviewRate}, #{reviewComment}, #{reviewStrength}, #{reviewWeak}, #{reviewWish}, #{reviewPromotion}, #{reviewWelfare}, #{reviewCulture}, #{reviewBalance}, #{reviewCeorate}, #{reviewCeosupport}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT company_cd FROM tb_company_info WHERE company_name = #{companyName}
SELECT company_name as companyName FROM tb_company_info ORDER BY company_cd
SELECT job_topindex_cd as jobTopIndexCd, job_topindex_name as jobTopIndexName FROM tb_job_topindex ORDER BY job_topindex_cd

SELECT company_review_cd as companyReviewCd, company_cd as companyCd, login_id as loginId, review_comment as reviewComment, review_regdate as reviewRegDate FROM tb_company_review WHERE review_allow = 0 ORDER BY review_regdate DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{linePerPage}

SELECT company_review_cd as companyReviewCd, company_cd as companyCd, login_id as loginId, (SELECT general_nick FROM tb_member_general WHERE general_id=loginId)as generalNick, (SELECT linked_nick FROM tb_member_linked WHERE linked_id=loginId)as linkedNick, review_workyear as reviewWorkYear, review_rate as reviewRate, review_comment as reviewComment, review_strength as reviewStrength, review_weak as reviewWeak, review_wish as reviewWish, review_promotion as reviewPromotion, review_welfare as reviewWelfare, review_culture as reviewCulture, review_balance as reviewBalance, review_ceorate as reviewCeorate, review_ceosupport as reviewCeosupport, review_regdate as reviewRegDate FROM tb_company_review review WHERE company_review_cd = #{companyReviewCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_company_review SET review_allow = 1, review_allowdate = now(), review_grantor = #{loginId} WHERE company_review_cd = #{companyReviewCd}

UPDATE tb_company_info SET company_total_rate = (SELECT a.total FROM (SELECT (c.company_total_rate + r.review_rate) as total from tb_company_info c, tb_company_review r where r.company_review_cd = #{companyReviewCd} AND c.company_cd = r.company_cd ) a)
WHERE company_cd = (SELECT company_cd FROM tb_company_review WHERE company_review_cd = #{companyReviewCd})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_company_interview( login_id, company_cd, company_name, job_topindex_cd, interview_experience, interview_summary, interview_question, interview_answer, interview_level, interview_passcheck, interview_regdate, interview_modidate ) VALUES ( #{loginId}, #{companyCd}, #{companyName}, #{jobTopIndexCd}, #{interviewExperience}, #{interviewSummary}, #{interviewQuestion}, #{interviewAnsewer}, #{interviewLevel}, #{interviewPasscheck}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT interview_cd as interviewCd, company_cd as companyCd, login_id as loginId, interview_summary as interviewSummary, interview_regdate as interviewRegdate FROM tb_company_interview WHERE interview_allow = 0 ORDER BY interview_regdate DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{linePerPage}

SELECT inter.interview_cd as interviewCd, inter.company_cd as companyCd, inter.company_name as companyName, login_id as loginId, (SELECT job_topindex_name FROM tb_job_topindex top WHERE top.job_topindex_cd = inter.job_topindex_cd) as jobTopIndexName, inter.interview_experience as interviewExperience, inter.interview_summary as interviewSummary, inter.interview_question as interviewQuestion, inter.interview_answer as interviewAnsewer, inter.interview_level as interviewLevel, inter.interview_passcheck as interviewPasscheck, DATE_FORMAT(inter.interview_regdate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as interviewRegdate FROM tb_company_interview inter WHERE interview_cd = #{interviewCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_company_interview SET interview_allow = 1, interview_allowdate = now(), interview_grantor = #{loginId} WHERE interview_cd = #{interviewCd}
